Oh, I like the ending. So because she wanted to keep both guys in her life, she lost both and everything. Makes sense. Plus the way he left was baller, just a letter and wedding ring in an envelope. Brutal, doesn’t even try to talk it out with her, just slips out while she’s asleep.
Also sometimes it's confusing who is who with the dudes.  The ponytail is a giveaway but probably another hair color would have helped.  Just observation neither here nor there

-- Turns out, husband found out about their affair. He knows his wife best after all. Girl cries and apologizes, but husband suddenly summons Mr Affair on attack position and asked her to show him how they do it. Girl was like wtf, but ends up doing it anyway. The next day, girl finds out that husband left her for his own good. The end. Lesson of the story, cheating is never a good move. If them people are important to you, friend, spouse or what not, don't do fucked up decisions. Anyway, this is just porn. If you cant fap to this, just move along and continue searching. Be a good kid and just fap on the corner to whatever shit you like. No one's gonna mind you except some weirdos who keep trashing on what other people fap to.

Dont know if this even needs a summary, but ill do one anyway just to give some light on why the woman cheated. Story is about 3 friends from college who like watching movies. They enjoy their company as friends until one of the guy confessed to the girl. Girl accepts it and they got married. One day, the other guy asked to meet up with girl "secretly". She accepted, and they had fun. Thing is, guy has been struggling because he felt left behind despite girl's strong words before that she wanted their group to stay forever. Probably due to being drunk, she got raped. Girl was a mess after that. On the next scene, we see the couple having sex. It doesn't seem like girl wasnt satisfied with her husband. But she was thinking about the thing with other guy a lot. She felt very sorry to other guy. She treasured her as a dear friend but due to their marriage, it has caused him so much pain.. at the very least, that's what she thought at that time they did it a 2nd time. --
